title: Two more gas tankers enroute to SL: Litro
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas states that it will make the payments for two more gas shipments tomorrow.
Its Chairman, Eng. Vijitha Herath stated that the ships are currently enroute to Sri Lanka.
Meanwhile, the Chairman also stated that 80,000 gas cylinders will be distributed to consumers today (22), and 60% of it will be distributed to Colombo and Gampaha Districts.
